property.name: headline
property.label: Headline
property.description: Provides a snapshot of the content

property.name: mainLink
property.label: Main link
property.description: A link displayed at the bottom of the block - in Markdown link format

property.name: copy
property.label: Copy
property.description: Provides further details where the headline alone may not be sufficient - in Markdown format.
property.default: Content blocks are simply a way to display content in columns to visually separate information for users.

property.name: image
property.label: Image source
property.description: Allows for different content to stand out and provide additional context - as an URL.

property.name: imageAlt
property.label: Image alt
property.description: Specifies an alternate text for the image, if the image cannot be displayed.

property.name: icon
property.label: Icon
property.description: An icon that helps users visualise different pieces of information and quickly distinguish between columns. Use Google Material icon name.

property.name: links
property.label: Links
property.description: A series of links displayed as bullet points below the copy - in Markdown link format.
property.default: [A relevant piece of content](#)[A juicy bit of news](#)[Sliders for the reader](#)

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
